name: PLAYING BOTH SIDES ( CCC JAM )
description:
Playing Both Sides, This was a submission to the CCC JAM ( https://itch.io/jam/ccc-jam ) using the theme "Playing Both Sides"

A short game about playing both Blue and Red to solve puzzles that allow you the enter the next room. This Game was made in 7 days but I still plan on continuing this project after the CCC JAM is over.

Thanks to Federico Nocioni for the music you can find his soundcloud here - https://soundcloud.com/federico-nocioni

===================================

Controls

"W,A,S,D" To walk

Hold "E" for pick up 

"Spacebar" To Jump

"Mouse" To look around
